Welcome!

Our mission is to build a **supportive** and **inclusive** community where students and professionals can **grow their geospatial skills together**.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

We run **monthly skill sharing tutorial sessions** where a member of our community teaches us something they have learned along the way.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Want to join the community and get access to the online workshop link? Email us at: uqgeo.community \@ gmail dot com\
